scripts.setup: npm install -g typescript coffeescript bower typings browserify watchify http-server
scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build
scripts.update: rm -rf bower_components typings node_modules; npm update; bower update; typings install
scripts.build: npm run clean; tsc    -p ./ ; coffee    -c -o lib src/coffee/*.coffee ; browserify lib/index.js --standalone Hoge -o dist/index.js
scripts.start: npm run build; tsc -w -p ./ & coffee -w -c -o lib src/coffee/*.coffee ; watchify   lib/index.js --standalone Hoge -o dist/index.js -v & http-server -s -p 8000
